channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游댮 21:36 Air alert in Odesa region. Follow for further updates.
item.description: 游댮 21:36 Air alert in Odesa region. Follow for further updates. #Odessa_region This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
